action_list.description: System action for creating an application

attrs.script:
sudo yum install -y yum-utils
sudo yum-config-manager --add-repo https://download.docker.com/linux/centos/docker-ce.repo
sudo yum makecache fast
sudo yum -y install @@{docker_version}@@
sudo systemctl start docker
sudo systemctl enable docker
sudo usermod -aG docker centos

sudo yum -y install iscsi-initiator-utils
sudo systemd-tmpfiles --create
sudo systemctl start iscsid
sudo systemctl enable iscsid

sudo systemctl status iscsid

sudo docker plugin install --grant-all-permissions ntnx/nutanix_volume_plugin:latest PRISM_IP="10.68.96.30" DATASERVICES_IP="10.68.96.20" PRISM_PASSWORD='GTE4Ever/' PRISM_USERNAME="admin" DEFAULT_CONTAINER="default" --alias nutanix
sudo docker swarm init

manager_token=`docker swarm join-token manager | grep token | xargs`

echo manager_token=$manager_token

worker_token=`docker swarm join-token worker | grep token | xargs`

echo worker_token=$worker_token

echo 'version: "3.3"

services:
  portainer:
    image: portainer/portainer:1.16.4
    deploy:
      replicas: 1
      placement:
        constraints:
          - node.role == manager
    ports:
      - 9000:9000
    volumes:
      - portainer-data:/data:nocopy
      - /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock:ro
      
volumes:
  portainer-data:
' | tee monitoring.yml

docker stack deploy -c monitoring.yml monitoring

action_list.name: action_create

action_list.name: action_start

action_list.name: action_stop

action_list.description: System action for restarting an application
action_list.name: action_restart

action_list.description: System action for deleting an application. Does not delete physical machines
